isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Striker Pin on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 30
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 56) . Cab door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Position the cab door striker pin (Item 1) at the cab lock pillar (Item 2) and install two torx head bolts (Item 4) through cab door striker pin, cab lock pillar into floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5), located inside cab lock pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and tighten to 19 to 23.5 Lbf-ft (26 to 32 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door striker pin.
